Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to study the transportation and housing needs of Randalls and Wards Islands
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority, in consultation with the New York city department of transportation and New York city department of housing preservation and development, to study the transportation and housing needs of Randalls and Wards Islands.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the metropolitan transportation authority to study the transportation and housing needs of Randalls and Wards Islands
